column4: Hi I'm a newbie...I have a E-MU 1212m sound card.  I can't understand how to understand on how to install the driver.
how new to Ubuntu or Linux in general even?
sound isn't really my area, but maybe I can hep you a little bit
how new?  and which versin of Ubuntu?
and sound does not work at all?
ok well  that's a bit odd for a desktop
it's lap tops that usually get the sound issues with Ubuntu
however I had a proper sound issue on my desktop for the first time with 9.10
you may be able to configure stuff and get your sound working, but it won't be that easy, especially when your new
what kind of sound hardware is it? nothing that fancy, or really new right?
don't know the answer?  or disappeard on me?
9.10  has issues with certain things that worked in the previous release 9.04, so maybe you should try that
